The OCR and extracellular acidification rate were measured using a Seahorse XFe96 metabolic analyzer following the procedure recommended by the manufacturer. For all experiments, brains from 10-day-old flies of the appropriate genotypes were dissected and plated at one brain per well on XFe96 plates (Seahorse Bioscience) and metabolic parameters assayed as described
41 . The OCR values were normalized to DNA content using a CyQUANT assay (ThermoFisher) following the manufacturerâ€™s protocol.
